content:
Let me find where the council output landed and link it to the project.

Now I have everything I need. Let me create the properly structured verdict JSON and save it to the verdicts directory so the frontend picks it up.

Now I have the full structure. Let me create the Mirari verdict JSON:

Now let me verify the frontend can see it:

The council verdict is now live in the system and linked to the Mirari project. The frontend should show it now — **5.5/10, NEEDS INFO**, with the 7-member council composition visible.

Refresh the Mirari project page. The verdict card should appear with the full breakdown — scores by dimension, all 5 recommended actions, and the risk list.
